articles.title: Europe to Target Russian Coal in Fresh Round of Sanctions - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The European Union is set to propose new sanctions on Russia, including banning coal imports and more action against oligarchs, European officials said. All 27 member states must approve the measures.
